publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2555 Stewart Stevenson:Congratulations to Peterhead FC—That the Parliament congratulates players, staff and management of Peterhead Football Club on achieving promotion to the Scottish Football League Second Division and looks forward to their continuing success in seasons and competitions to come. Supported by: David Mundell*, Jim Mather*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Fox*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr David Davidson*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*, Fergus Ewing*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2555 Congratulations to Peterhead FC (lodged on 9 March 2005) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-2555 Stewart Stevenson:Congratulations to Peterhead FC—That the Parliament congratulates players, staff and management of Peterhead Football Club on achieving promotion to the Scottish Football League Second Division and looks forward to their continuing success in seasons and competitions to come. Supported by: David Mundell, Jim Mather, Richard Lochhead, Rob Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Colin Fox, Shiona Baird, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr David Davidson, Brian Adam, Bruce Crawford, Michael Matheson, Robin Harper, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mrs Nanette Milne, Dr Jean Turner
